Comment: Recognising Crimea would help to normalise such expansonist land grabs. Trump would like this as a prelude to annexing Greenland expecting this would help acceptance of that too. Canada beware.  Lifting sactions against Russia would allow it to scale up its war production even more without its economy failing opening the possibility for a later renewed invasion of Ukraine "to finish the job". Trump is throwing Ukraine to the Russian wolves.  By starving Ukraine of more military help Trump is actively helping Putin. I felt Biden wanted to send more weapons than he did but the Reps weaponised the issue to damage Biden's election prospects. So Biden had to limit weapons supply to not give the Reps too much ammunition against him. He sent what he could before he left office but after that Trump chose Putin's side and betrayed everything the US and its former allies stood for.  As the Devil's pope on Earth Trump is spreading hate, death and misery wherever he can. USAID's demise is already causing massive starvation in Sudan. The crimes keep coming.

Comment: Again, you have to think about what they see as "strong." To them, stuff like soft power, cultural hegemony or even just economic power are all "soft" and "weak." All they idolize, and all they think matters, is the ability to threaten and bully people. They see Putin threaten to invade and murder people,e and they see that as him projecting strength.   It's why they see Trump as strong when he yells about making Canada the 51st state. To them, he's showing the world that America can do whatever it wants and no one can stop us.

Comment: Thinking a bully is strong is a mistake. Russia is the bully in this war, and the ‘big dog’ in the fight, which appeals to Trump as he wants to back the “winner”. But their economy is stuffed, riddled with corruption, and the populace is growing increasingly sick of the inconvenience of war. Ukraine is fighting for its very existence, and that’s a fight any country would continue to the death. Putin should remember his lesson about the cornered rat and Trump should chew on that awhile. He’s backing the wrong winner.
